wikipedia_page.main: Charles Lucas (18 July 1884 – 3 November 1975) was a British sports shooter. He competed in the trap event at the 1952 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1952 Summer Olympics

response: Charles Lucas (1613–1648) was a Royalist general in the English Civil War.
Charles Lucas may also refer to:
*Charles Lucas (lawyer) (1803–1889), French lawyer and prison reformer
*Charles Lucas Anthony (1960–1983), one of the commanders of the LTTE rebel group in Sri Lanka
